## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                         | Type                   | Default        |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | ---------------------- | -------------- |
| `label`  | `label`   | Accessible label for screen readers | `string`               | `'Loading...'` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the spinner                 | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"` | `'md'`         |
